episodes.title: The Future of Ellis County: A Conversation with County Judge Todd Little
episodes.description: County Judge Todd Little joins us to discuss the county's budget priorities, infrastructure challenges, and vision for sustainable growth.

guest.name: Todd Little
guest.title: Ellis County Judge
guest.bio: Todd Little is serving his second term as Ellis County Judge, leading the county's administrative and judicial functions.

keyQuotes: We're committed to responsible growth that preserves our county's character while meeting the needs of new residents.

episodes.title: Education Excellence: Talking with WISD Superintendent Dr. Bonny Cain
episodes.description: Dr. Bonny Cain, Superintendent of Waxahachie ISD, discusses innovative programs, teacher retention, and preparing students for the future.

guest.name: Dr. Bonny Cain
guest.title: Waxahachie ISD Superintendent
guest.bio: Dr. Bonny Cain leads one of Ellis County's largest school districts, serving over 8,000 students.

keyQuotes: Our teachers are the heart of everything we do, and investing in them is investing in our community's future.

episodes.title: Public Safety First: Chief Perspectives on Community Policing
episodes.description: Police chiefs from across Ellis County share their approaches to community-oriented policing and building trust.

guest.name: Chief Robert Taylor
guest.title: Waxahachie Police Chief
guest.bio: Chief Robert Taylor has over 25 years of law enforcement experience and leads the Waxahachie Police Department.
